tab1.text1:
<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">Welcome to the server! This is a PVE server with slightly boosted rates to remove a lot of the tediousness of Ark while preserving your enjoyment.</>


<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">This server is self-hosted on a dedicated server in Oklahoma, United States on a dedicated 1Gbps fiber connection.</>


<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">If you have any questions, please feel free to ask in chat or join the discord and ask there.</>
